post:
iKoula Debuts with Dedi Servers From €15/month in France!

france, ikoula February 8, 2021 @ 6:00 am, by raindog308

Hey there, iKoula!

This is their first appearance on LowEndBox so please give them a LowEndWelcome.  They’re starting out their journey with a special offer:

  • Between February 8 and February 12, 2021, they’re offering 50% off recurring on their dedicated servers with coupon code IKLET50!
  • Prices as low as an e3 for €15/month!
  • All dedis feature unlimited transfer!

Wowzers kazowers!  That’s great.  Their sale stretches all the way from a modest i3 up to a beefy 64GB e5 with twin drives.  If you want a dedi in Europe, now’s the time to jump in!

They are registered in France (417680618). Their Terms of Service is available on their web site. They accept PayPal, American Express, Master Card, VISA, Bank Transfer, Alipay.

Here’s a little about iKoula in their own words:

IKOULA is a specialist of web hosting, dedicated servers and cloud computing since February 1998. We own 2 Data Centers in France (Reims and Eppes), plus 2 business units in Nederland and Spain. Our solution “CloudIKOULAONE” is available in 3 continents (Europe, Asia and USA). Our teams are fluent in more than 10 different languages and available 24/7 in order to help you in your projects.

Remember that the LEB community would love to hear about your experience in the comments section below!

Now read more to see the offers!
